Output Modules.​PIT_TABLE.​PIT_TABLE_PKG Body

Implementation package for type PIT_TABLE

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Published under MIT licence

Helper Methods
persist_params
procedure persist_params(
p_id in pit_table_params.ptp_id%type,
p_pse_id in pit_table_params.ptp_pse_id%type,
p_params in msg_params
)

Helper method to write to table <PIT_TABLE_PARAMS>.  Is used to wrap the insert operation on <PIT_TABLE_PARAMS>, used by several methods

Parameters
p_id
in pit_table_params.ptp_id%type

ID of the entry, taken from PIT_CALL_STACK_TYPE or <PIT_LOG_STATE_TYPE>

p_pse_id
in pit_table_params.ptp_pse_id%type

Severity of the entry. 70 if CALL_STACK entry

p_params
in msg_params

Instance of MSG_PARAMS
